text: Mister Ecuador (Organización Mr Ecuador) is an annual national male beauty pageant that selects Ecuador's representatives to Mister United Continents and Mister Global. ==Organization== Mister Ecuador was founded in 1990 by Cesar Montece (+) (CEO of Queen of Ecuador). ==Titleholders== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" !width="30" style="background-
